Name: Examination Chambers
About the game: In this short narrative puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles. Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on the corresponding buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles. Playtime on your first run may be around 15-20 Minutes. In succeeding playthroughs, you can challenge yourself with proceeding through the game as fast as possible and even enjoy the party mode. Convert small cubes to a big cube and the other way around, place the cubes on the correct buttons to figure out the challenges. Have fun!
